title: bought mystery chest and it doesn't look like I got anything from it
body: I bought a mystery chest and first it never showed up in my loot or wherever its supposed to go... I log out, log back and and it says I've recieved the chest but doesn't tell me where the chest is or what was in it?  I bought a mystery skin after that and it told me exactly what I got.  I went through all the skins in the shop to see if any said owned underneath that I think I didn't have before but I'm not seeing anything.... nothing in purchase history either :/  any chance you can see what I recieved or if I didn't receive anything...

replies.body:
Sometimes those windows close a wee bit too fast don't they?

Looks like the first one gave you Bewitching Nidalee and the second gave you Battlecast Xerath!
thank you a ton.  appreciate it.
